nodes.text: The Original Dozen was a group of medical droids, originally taken from the Wandering Star, reprogrammed and upgraded by Fyzen Gor. The Original Dozen assisted Gor in his quest to activate the Phylanx Redux Transmitter, which they planned to use to start a droid uprising by altering their programming so they would kill organics. The fortune-teller Poppy Delu once used pieces of the Original Dozen as Vazaveer fichas. All of the surviving droids were destroyed in the skirmish that led to Gor's death and the transmitter's destruction.
